title: Analyzing and Applying Educational Contextual Conditions for University Teaching Design

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced expertise in elementary education and language pedagogy
context.additional_context: Designing language pedagogy using VR simulations in smartphone-based, limited-technology environments.

learning_goals: Learners can explain six educational context conditions (content, innovation, instructional design, learner attitudes, learner characteristics, teacher-student relationships) to consider when designing university teaching methods.
Learners can analyze the language acquisition process of small learner groups using VR simulations and design personalized instructional strategies.
Learners can perform project-based assessments using smartphone-based tools in limited technological environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
